attributes.review: When I opened the app I all of a sudden didn’t care about human rights. People of color would walk by me and I wanted to yell at them to go back to their countries! All I wanted to do is make money off of minorities. When I didn’t get exactly what I wanted I would make a scene and ask for the store manager. Worst experience of my life. I was hurting everyone around me!
attributes.title: The worst!

attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I heard about the president that made this country “great”. I guess I wanted to see what he used to brainwash people.  I open the app and the first words are “join us today to keep America great”. I guess You could say this app is great...just like Amerikkka is great. Now that we have reached this “peak” let’s keep it that way! Let’s just say I’m worried.
attributes.title: For Dummies Only 💯💯

attributes.review: This app is TERRIBLE! Don’t get it, it has hacked my phone and now my ohone won’t stop playing the gummy bear song. Im scared to even opened my phone now. This is the worst app ever! I was expecting more from this. And my phone keeps dying fast and it keeps making farting sounds. I am disgusted and disappointed. Overall please stay away from this app!
attributes.title: Terrible, disgusting, shatty app!

attributes.review: After a minute of opening the app to support my dear president, a horrid smell rose from my device! The HORRID smell attracted what seemed like hundreds of worms from my front lawn into MY ROOM. The neighbors watched from a distance while the worms marched their way toward the smell. All of the worms were ORANGE and smelled of rotten milk! never in my 3625 years of life have i seen ORANGE WORMS! DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS RIDICULOUS APP! Don’t put your family in danger THE WORMS AREN’T WORTH IT!
attributes.title: Absolutely RIDICULOUS

attributes.review: When I first opened the app I got scared out of my mind, I don’t think it’s a good idea to have it opened around children. I showed it to my baby sister and she started screaming at the top of her lungs! It’s disgusting, it’s revolting, i dedicated my entire life to Jesus Christ and this is the things I get!? Overall it’s scary and I don’t think this should be allowed on the Internet.
attributes.title: I don’t like it ✨🦋🧚‍♀️🥰

attributes.review: I’ve never been so upset with an app in my life. It just was awful. The moment I opened the app my baby turned into the anti christ and began flying around chanting “YOUR TIME IS UP” and “THE RECKONING HAS BEGUN”. I don’t even know what that means! And then he started speaking in tongues and eating the dog. Poor Fido! I hope this stupid app gets taken down. Have an terrible, horrible, no good, very bad day.
attributes.title: Absolutely horrible 😡😡🤬👹👹👅

attributes.review: The second i downloaded the app and accepted the terms and policies, a man in a white sheet burst through my window and started to beat me and my family senseless. When I called the police, they arrived 30 minutes late and then mistook my 8 yo son as the suspect and took him to holding. But the very next day I deleted the app and suddenly my son was back in my arms.
attributes.title: Worst decision of my life!!

attributes.review:
This is the worst app I’ve ever used in my life I don’t like the way how it works I don’t like anything about it I don’t see what’s the good in it , I absolutely hate it with all my soul I really don’t like it and I really wish this app doesn’t exist because it’s horrible and because it’s not good for other people and it’s actually disgusting this app
Horrible🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮
attributes.title: Terrible app

attributes.review: App made my phone glitch, took over 40 minutes to download, very very slow, app shared my private information without my permission, and in my opinion violates a person’s privacy rights. Not to mention it sent alerts to my phone every other minute  killing my phone battery really fast, don’t download not worth it.
attributes.title: Deserves a zero

attributes.review:
This app is HORRIBLE!!!
I downloaded it and it took ALL of the wifi from my house!! It made my phone turn into a transformer and run away from me! I had to run 100 miles to get it back. IT RUINED MY HOUSE!!! All because of our orange 🍊 president who likes throwing a tantrums. This is the worst app I have ever downloaded ever in my entire life!!!!!😡
🦟🦗🦟🦗🦟🦗🦟🦗🦟
